properties.info: An attractive three-bedroom semi-detached family home located 0.5 miles from Petts Wood station, with easy access to shops, schools, bus routes, and woodland, featuring two reception rooms, a fitted kitchen/breakfast room, conservatory, utility room, cloakroom, three bedrooms, a family bathroom, separate WC, double glazing, gas central heating, and a well-presented interior.
properties.description: Attractive three bedroom semi-detached family home situated within 0.5 miles of Petts Wood station with fast trains to London and within easy walking distance of local shops, schools, bus routes and National Trust woodland. The property comprises; two receptions, fitted 18'9 x 10'1 kitchen/breakfast room and conservatory. The property also benefits from having a utility room and cloakroom. To the first floor there are three bedrooms and a family bathroom with separate WC. Additional features include double glazing, gas central heating and a well presented interior...
properties.location: Petts Wood Road, Petts Wood, Orpington BR5

properties.info: This well-presented two-bedroom, two-bathroom garden flat features a modern open-plan kitchen, solid wooden floors, bi-folding doors to a private courtyard, double-sized bedrooms, a family bathroom with shower attachment, a separate wet room, walnut doors throughout, and Sky TV wiring, with the added benefit of a 10-year building guarantee.
properties.description:
Presented in excellent decorative order throughout is this two double bedroom, two bathroom, garden flat.
The modern fitted kitchen is open plan to the living room which boasts solid wooden floors and includes integrated appliances including a dishwasher & a washing machine. This large open plan benefits from bi folding doors onto a secluded private courtyard garden. Both bedrooms are double sized, and the family bathroom boasts a matching three piece suite a shower attachment over the bath. There is also a separate wet room. There are walnut doors throughout and wiring for Sky TV/aerial points in the living room/kitchen and both bedrooms.
This apartment being only five years old, is still under a 10 year building guarantee...

properties.info: This top-floor two-bedroom, two-bathroom apartment in the sought-after Discovery Dock development offers stunning dock views, 24-hour concierge, secure underground parking, gym and pool access, a spacious living area, modern open-plan kitchen, large double bedrooms, en-suite and main bathrooms, underfloor heating, floor-to-ceiling windows, and wooden flooring throughout, and is just minutes from South Quay Station and direct access to Canary Wharf.
properties.description: This impressive top-floor two-bedroom, two-bathroom apartment is located in the highly sought-after Discovery Dock development, offering breathtaking views of the dock. The property includes a range of luxury amenities, including a 24-hour concierge service, secure underground parking, and access to a fully equipped gym and pool. The spacious living area is designed for modern living, with an open-plan kitchen that features contemporary finishes. Both large double bedrooms offer ample space, with the master featuring an en-suite bathroom. The property also boasts a stylish main bathroom, underfloor heating, and floor-to-ceiling windows that flood the apartment with natural light. The wooden flooring throughout adds to the sense of elegance and comfort. Ideally situated, the apartment is just a few minutesâ€™ walk from South Quay Station, providing direct access to Canary Wharf, making it the perfect choice for those seeking a convenient and luxurious urban lifestyle.

properties.info: The Kirkdale is a stunning and spacious four bedroom detached family home with garage and driveway for additional parking at 1354sqft. You'll love family meals in the kitchen-diner, with your French doors open to the garden
properties.description: The Kirkdale is a spacious four-bedroom detached family home, complete with a garage, driveway, and an open-plan kitchen-diner with French doors leading to the garden. Located just 4 miles from Birmingham City Centre, this high-quality home from a trusted 5-star builder also features a handy utility room, cloakroom, and the opportunity to personalize your home to your taste.
properties.location: Tenchlee Place, Hall Green, Birmingham, B28

properties.info: Introducing The Newton Penthouse at Three60, Manchester's luxury living at its finest. Spanning 1,901 sq. ft. across the 49th and 50th floors, this stunning penthouse boasts bespoke interiors, panoramic views, a spacious living area, a contemporary kitchen with premium appliances, and three opulent bedrooms. Residents also enjoy exclusive amenities, including a gym, co-working space, and landscaped roof terrace. Located in the heart of Manchester, The Newton offers a unique blend of luxury, convenience, and style.
properties.description: The Newton Penthouse at Three60 offers luxurious living across the 49th and 50th floors, spanning 1,901 sq. ft. with bespoke interiors and stunning views of Castlefield. The spacious 49th-floor living area features floor-to-ceiling windows and an open-plan kitchen with premium Siemens appliances. The 50th floor hosts three opulent bedrooms, including a master suite with a luxurious en-suite bathroom. Residents enjoy exclusive amenities, including a gym, Peloton studio, co-working space, private dining, and a roof terrace. Located in Manchesterâ€™s vibrant city center, The Newton offers unparalleled luxury and convenience.

properties.info: This impressive five-bedroom townhouse, set over five levels and extending to around 5,400 square feet, features a private garden, roof terrace with hot tub and stunning southerly views, off-street parking, original period details, a sleek contemporary kitchen with Miele appliances, flexible living spaces, five generously sized double bedrooms, a luxurious en suite bathroom, and a lower ground floor that could function as a self-contained apartment with further living space, gym, and a shower room.
properties.description: This impressive five-bedroom townhouse spans five levels, offering approximately 5,400 square feet of luxurious living space. It features a private garden, a roof terrace with a hot tub, and stunning southerly views, perfect for relaxing or entertaining. The property also includes off-street parking and retains many original period features while incorporating sleek, modern touches. The contemporary kitchen is equipped with high-end Miele appliances, and the spacious living areas provide flexibility for various needs. Each of the five generously sized double bedrooms is thoughtfully designed, with the master suite boasting a luxurious en-suite bathroom. The lower ground floor offers potential as a self-contained apartment, complete with additional living space, a gym, and a shower room, making it ideal for guests or extended family.

properties.info: This immaculately presented third-floor modern apartment, located in a quiet, manicured development near Blackford Hill, university buildings, and the hospital, offers an allocated parking space, gas central heating, double glazing, and pleasant views, with a welcoming hallway, bright lounge with a feature fireplace, contemporary dining kitchen, master bedroom with en-suite, two additional double bedrooms, and a stylish main bathroom.
properties.description: This immaculately presented third-floor apartment is located in a peaceful and well-maintained development near Blackford Hill, university buildings, and the hospital. Offering an allocated parking space, gas central heating, and double glazing, it boasts pleasant views and a welcoming hallway. The bright lounge features a charming fireplace, creating a cozy atmosphere, while the contemporary dining kitchen is perfect for entertaining. The master bedroom benefits from an en-suite, and there are two additional generously sized double bedrooms. The stylish main bathroom adds to the modern appeal of the apartment, making it an ideal home for those seeking comfort and convenience in a prime location.
properties.location: West Savile Gardens, Blackford, Edinburgh, EH9
